accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: Open for research without restrictions, except for Oscar Shaftel's FBI files (box 2) which are closed until 2017.

bioghist.head: Historical/Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Oscar Shaftel (1912-2000) was a faculty member at Queens College who was fired in 1953 after he refused to answer the New York City Board of Higher Educcation's questions about Communist affiliations in academia.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Box 1 contains clippings (many concerned with efforts to obtain subsequent exoneration), correspondence, printed ephemera, legal documents and testimonies. on Shaftel, broadsides, pamphlets and flyers, the testimony of Shaftel and Vera Shlakman before the United States Senate Internal Security Subcommittee. Shaftel's FBI file in Box 2 is closed to researchers until 2017. PLEASE DIRECT FURTHER INQUIRIES TO: peter.filardo@nyu.edu
